name: Gems Match Madness
description:
Hi! This is my first project in Unity 3D. I'm currently planning to publish it on Android too.

Description: Look at the pattern and try to remove the gems of the same color by joining them in a line or diagonal. Successfully complete the objective of each level and get the highest score. Good luck!

Update: You can play it now on Android! Here is the link of the Play Store: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.DragonSpiritGames.GemsMatchMad...

I hope you like it! Thanks :D
